profile_positions.description: History & Heraldry, founded in 1996, is the world market leader in the development, production and distribution of impulse products. We are now active in almost 60 countries and the company is still owned by the founders. History & Heraldry's success is based on unique design, innovation & own production of impulse products with emotional value. More than 450 sales colleagues meanwhile service more than 70,000 satisfied retailers who trust the quality and innovative strength of our range. With over 40 million items sold every year, an H&H item is sold every second worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Country Manager

profile_positions.description:
In the role as Head of Operations and Sales my main responsibility is the management of our 30.000+ points of sale & approx. 3000 employees in our 16 beeline countries. As part of the European Board I am responsible for the development of the European Strategy, Key Account Management, POS operations including the project portfolio.  

beeline is the international market leader in fashion jewelry and fashion accessories. beeline offers the latest trends for affordable prices making use of the brands SIX, I AM and TOSH. On top of that beeline operates with a generic White Label called Accessories and beeline offers Private Labels as well.  Distribution takes places through more than 200 retail and franchise stores worldwide and in over 30.000 Concessions POS in 16 European Countries and in North-America. The Head Office is located in Cologne in Germany.
